results.title: Dear Theo
results.creator_credit: Jean Beaudin, Paul Larose and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: After a serious car accident, a young woman whose parents are separated and like herself intent on lives of pleasure or business, is placed in a room with a seventy year old lady, who writes to and receives loving letters from her eighty-one year old husband to whom she has been married for nearly fifty years. As time passes the two become warm friends until Josette dies leaving a special gift for Julie who then, passes it on

results.title: Dear mum
results.creator_credit: Don Marley, Peter Johnson, Cinesound Movietone and Film Australia
results.brief_description: A highly entertaining and at times funny film about the life of a young soldier in the army. He writes to tell his mum all the great things that happen in the army - like seeing the country; friendship; a lot of spare time and the satisfaction from working as a group.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Don Marley, Peter Johnson, Cinesound Movietone and Film Australia

results.title: A Day in the desert
results.brief_description: Contrary to common opinion the desert supports a profusion of wildlife. Desert flora and fauna all exhibit adaptations to retain, prevent loss of, or derive small amounts of water. In this film specialised survival techniques which permit the withstanding of long periods of drought and extreme temperature changes are studied in the horned toad, badger, peccary, gila woodpecker, various species of desert birds, spiders, snakes and a variety of plants and other animals.

results.title: Dawn flight
results.brief_description: A dramatic story of a young glider pilot. In stunning aerial manoeuvers, tree-top chases, and pursuits through rocky canyons he is haunted by a mysterious super-pilot

results.title: The Davis Cup, 1951
results.brief_description: The story of Australia’s fight to retain the world tennis premiership. The film covers the Interzone Final in Melbourne between Sweden and the USA and the Challenge Round in Sydney between the USA and Australia. Narrated by Michael Charlton and Peter Whitchurch.
results.description: The story of Australia’s fight to retain the world tennis premiership. The film covers the Interzone Final in Melbourne between Sweden and the USA and the Challenge Round in Sydney between the USA and Australia. Narrated by Michael Charlton and Peter Whitchurch.

results.title: Dates
results.creator_credit: Donovan Miller and Hollywood Film Enterprises
results.brief_description: Date growing in the Coachella Valley of Southern California. Outlines the history of date cultivation in the region; shows artificial pollination, harvesting, grading and packing of the fruit.

results.title: Date with history: Hiroshima
results.brief_description: Shows the preliminary events leading up to the bombing of Hiroshima in August, 1945 in which 72,000 people were killed. some of the people involved are interviewed, giving their reactions to the holocaust. The film contains actual footage of the events.

results.title: Danish design
results.creator_credit: Brandon Films and Danish Society of Arts and Crafts and Independent Designers
results.brief_description: Danish contemporary art and design. Examples of the best known furniture designers, fabrics, silverware and kitchen utensils, illustrate Danish functionalism inspired by craft traditions, art and culture of other countries. A skilled craftsman is shown making a chair.

results.title: The Dangerous years
results.creator_credit: William T. Cartwright and Bud Wiser
results.brief_description: Examines the juvenile crime dilemma facing society today. Through actual on-the-spot scenes, this film reveals the world of the juvenile offender and the often frustrated efforts of the police to stem the tide of juvenile crime.
results.description: Examines the juvenile crime dilemma facing society today. Through actual on-the-spot scenes, this film reveals the world of the juvenile offender and the often frustrated efforts of the police to stem the tide of juvenile crime.
